string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Which cameo character do you look forward to seeing the most?
If you didn\’t do frisbee, what would you be doing?
It\’s 7pm, what are you up to?

string-array.name: alex_answers
string-array.item: Did I mention I\'ve been to Japan

string-array.name: amy_answers
string-array.item: I made a short film about my despair

string-array.name: jack_answers
string-array.item: I don\'t even like this degree

string-array.name: sam_answers
string-array.item: I don\'t care (but I\'ll do well anyway)

string-array.name: tom_answers
string-array.item: My course mates will do better than me

string-array.name: sophie_quotes
string-array.item: I have never met this person before in my life
Impersonating Beyoncé is not your destiny, child
He must have sold his soul to become that photogenic
This man single-handedly keeps END in business

string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: You are Alex! You may be injured, but you are astonishingly handsome, have a bunch of girlfriends and are capable of literally anything. Also you\'d be better at cooking if you actually did it more often.
You are Amy! You always have plans going on, and are surrounded by your ever-adoring fans. A blessing, or a curse? Also, you can\'t eat bread.
You are Jack! You know everything about everything, memorising a bunch of compelling facts about interesting topics, even if all we hear about is smartphones and EDM.
You are Sam! Talented at anything you try, you keep it on the down-low by only playing tennis and trombone. Your love for toast surpasses all else, which is probably why you\'re still single.
You are Tom! Normal social conventions don\'t apply to you - you\'re not afraid to be the most fashionable and passionate person around... even if it means strutting the library catwalk every night.
